categoryDescription: Commands that (will) require a premium membership

message.description: What do you want to tell ChatGPT?

model.description: Which model do you want to use?

chatgpt.rateLimit: The ratelimit has been reached. Please try again in a few seconds.
chatgpt.notAvailable: The API is currently not available. Please check back later.
chatgpt.error: The API responded with an error.

customname.description: Set a custom nickname and I will call you that.

global.description: Should I call you like that on every server?

target.description: Who's custom nickname do you want to know?

global.description: Should I tell you your global nickname or your guild-specific one?
Should I remove your global nickname or your guild-specific one?

set.success: I will call you "{name}" from now on.

editmessage.description: Edit any message sent by the bot

channel.description: The channel the message is in.

message_id.description: The id of the message you want me to edit.

remove_attachments.description: Clear out everything on that message. eg. embeds, files

editmessage.textInputLabel: Write the new content for that message.
editmessage.notFound: There is no message with that id in the specified channel!
editmessage.notBotMessage: I can only edit my own messages!
editmessage.timedout: You took to long to reply!
editmessage.emptyJson: The JSON you provided is empty!
editmessage.error:
An error occurred while trying to send your custom JSON:
```{err}```

record.description: Record a voice channel. Needs approval from users.

channel.description: Wich voice channel do you want to record?

public.description: Make the recording public, so any guild member can hear it.

record.noTarget: There is no one to record! Either all targets are bots or they are not in a voice channel! If you supplied a channel, make sure it is the one the target is in!
record.needVoiceChannel: You need to supply a voice channel or be in one!
record.cannotJoin: I can not join that voice channel! Make sure the channel is not full and I have the needed permissions.
record.deaf: I am currently deafened and i cannot undeaf myself!
record.embedDescription:
<@{user}> wants to record you in voice channel <#{channel}>.
**{publicOrPrivate}**
Please press a button to allow or deny the recording of your voice.
record.isPublic: This recording will be available to every member of the guild.
record.isPrivate: This recording will be only available for the current members of the voice channel that allowed the recording.
record.cantConnect: I could not connect to the voice channel! Please try again.
record.denied: No one wants to get recorded.
record.canceled: The recording request has been canceled.
record.updated: Your response has been set to `{permission}`. I am waiting for the other members to reply.
record.notFound: Your recording has not been found!
record.privateReady: Press the button to get the recording.
